Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , the HOMO level ( -5.24 eV ) was lower than the PEDOT : PSS HOMO level ( -5.0 eV ) by 0.24 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| HOMO level of unspecified material: -5.24 eV |
| HOMO level of PEDOT : PSS: -5.0 eV |
| Difference in HOMO levels: 0.24 eV |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |

The entities "HOMO level of unspecified material" and "HOMO level of PEDOT : PSS" clearly refer to material properties and their values. The entity "difference in HOMO levels" also refers to a material property, specifically the difference between the HOMO levels of two materials.
